# List of awards and nominations received by Allu Arjun

Allu Arjun is an Indian actor and media personality who works in Telugu cinema. He has established as one of the popular celebrities in India and also one of the highest paid actors in India. Arjun is also widely known for his dancing and has appeared in more than 20 films. His performance in the films such as Arya (2004), Desamuduru (2007), Parugu (2008), Vedam (2010), Race Gurram (2014), Rudhramadevi (2015) and Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo (2020) fetched him various accolades including six CineMAA Awards, six Filmfare South Awards, three Nandi Awards and three SIIMA awards.
